label: neutral
src_text: Public shame is not something we can really control regardless of your positions on it.
augmented_text: "I don't think it's fair to make assumptions about someone's character without getting to know them personally."

label: neutral
src_text: Not the person you're asking, but in my own experience, women appreciate the honest approach.
augmented_text: For what it's worth, I believe that vulnerability can lead to meaningful interactions.

label: neutral
src_text: I hope I make you smile with a picture of my Maisie... https://i.imgur.com/MwFOtdx.jpg
augmented_text: "Hope this pic of my furry friend brightens up your day! 🐶❤️"

label: neutral
src_text: Really enjoyed your Manifold series, some of my favorite " hard sci-fi " books.
augmented_text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts on the series. I'm always looking for new recommendations. 🤔👍

label: neutral
src_text: Despite what you heard, we fans actually love our players and treat them like family.
augmented_text: Don't believe the rumors, our church is a place of love and acceptance for everyone, regardless of their beliefs.

label: neutral
src_text: I am all for Gender equality (LBGTQ2) but Sex is a scientific definition of your reproductive organs/function.
augmented_text: "I think it's important to listen to different perspectives on abortion, even if we don't agree on everything."

label: neutral
src_text: Agreed, that's why you need to question everything, including our scientific community.
augmented_text: I appreciate your commitment to fact-based discourse. In today's world, it's more important than ever to rely on verifiable data and avoid spreading misinformation. #factchecking

label: neutral
src_text: Please inform me with your enlightened perspective on how we aren't leaders at the university level.
augmented_text: "I don't understand why some people insist on labeling themselves as ' introverts' or 'extroverts.' Can't we all just be people?"

label: neutral
src_text: I shared your story with my husband last night, and he nearly cried.
augmented_text: Have you guys seen that viral tweet about the penguin who got lost? So adorable! 🐧

src_text: I and my belief system hate that you have a point.
augmented_text: "I don't agree with your opinion, but I appreciate the way you expressed it."

src_text: A good tech will be happier to fix it for you than to have you post something negative in Yelp.
augmented_text: "Love supporting local businesses like [business name]. They always provide quality products and services."

src_text: Please inform me with your enlightened perspective on how we aren't leaders at the university level.

label: neutral
src_text: Nor do I like giving my attention to people that think insulting your fellow man is okay.
augmented_text: "I don't have time for friends who only want to gossip about others."

src_text: In my experience is doesn't matter what conditions you add in the description / title.

src_text: Bro, two hours ago you said we shouldn't have fought the Nazis.
